content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    FORMAT(time, 'yyyy-MM') as periodo,
    avg(HR_Valor) as humedad_promedio
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://adlswaltercalcagno.dfs.core.windows.net/gold/humedad/humedad.snappy.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY FORMAT(time, 'yyyy-MM')
